1.0.0.name: wordpress/slidermania
1.0.0.description:
Plugin Slidermania is powerful WordPress plugin for inserting in content of WP site big amount of different JavaScript sliders. For the moment of plugin release its has 10 slider scripts ready for using. For example it are such great sliders as: Nivo, Showcase Awkward, Yoxview, Galleria (free themes), Flexslider and others. Sliders are inserted by shortcodes button which is on content editor panel. Sizes of slides are limited only by your imagination, in settings page user is available to create unlimited count of slides sizes. You can place sliders: on sidebars by widget,on page top, in any place of content. http://pluginus.net/slidermania - all additional info read and watch here.

TTENTION! AFTER INSTALLING SLIDERMANIA INSTALL WP PLUGIN Force Regenerate Thumbnails AND REGENERATE THUMBNAILS, ANOTHER WAY IMAGES DOES APPEARS, AND YOU CAN THINK THAT IT IS BUG!!
